supportPage.title: Support
supportPage.description: Facing a bug, have a question, or need help? Let us know what’s going on, we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
supportPage.label: Your message
supportPage.placeholder: Describe your issue or question in detail...

toast.success: Thanks! Your message has been sent.
toast.error: An error occurred while sending your message.

form.label: Your feedback
form.description: Got an idea, frustration, or quick thought? We'd love to hear it. For urgent issues or anything blocking your workflow, please contact support.
form.placeholder: What would you like to share?

toast.error: An error occurred while sending your feedback.
